trans-unit.source: An interface used to insert or update a resource by the HTTP POST method.
trans-unit.target: 用來插入或更新資源，HTTP POST 方法的介面。

trans-unit.source: The IUpdatable interface is resource independent.
trans-unit.target: IUpdatable 介面是獨立的資源。

trans-unit.source: The methods that return objects representing resources can return anything.
trans-unit.target: 傳回物件，代表資源的方法可以傳回任何項目。

trans-unit.source: The returned object is an opaque object that represents the resource.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的物件是表示資源的不透明物件。

trans-unit.source: To use the reference to read or update a value, the same opaque object is passed back to IUpdatable.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用參考讀取或更新值，相同的不透明物件會傳遞回 IUpdatable。

trans-unit.source: Implementation of IUpdatable must track the mapping between this opaque object to the object it represents.
trans-unit.target: 實作 IUpdatable 必須追蹤此不透明的物件與它所代表的物件之間的對應。

trans-unit.source: When the resource is serialized and a common language runtime (CLR) instance of the correct type is needed, the ResolveResource method on IUpdatable is called with the opaque object.
trans-unit.target: 當資源已序列化，需要正確類型的通用語言執行階段 (CLR) 執行個體時 ResolveResource IUpdatable 上使用呼叫方法的不透明的物件。

trans-unit.source: To serialize the object, call the <xref:System.Data.Services.IUpdatable.ResolveResource%2A> method on IUpdatable.
trans-unit.target: 若要序列化的物件，呼叫<xref:System.Data.Services.IUpdatable.ResolveResource%2A>IUpdatable 上的方法。</xref:System.Data.Services.IUpdatable.ResolveResource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified value to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的值加入至集合。

trans-unit.source: Target object that defines the property.
trans-unit.target: 定義屬性的目標物件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the collection property to which the resource should be added..
trans-unit.target: 資源應該加入集合屬性的名稱...

trans-unit.source: The opaque object representing the resource to be added.
trans-unit.target: 不透明的物件，表示要加入的資源。

trans-unit.source: Cancels a change to the data.
trans-unit.target: 取消變更資料。

trans-unit.source: Creates the resource of the specified type and that belongs to the specified container.
trans-unit.target: 建立指定的資源類型且屬於指定的容器。

trans-unit.source: CreateResource is called to insert a new resource by the HTTP POST method.
trans-unit.target: CreateResource HTTP POST 方法會呼叫插入新的資源。

trans-unit.source: The first parameter points to the container that the resource belongs to and the second parameter is the namespace-qualified name of the resource type that needs to be created.
trans-unit.target: 第一個參數指向的資源所屬的容器和第二個參數是您必須建立的資源類型的命名空間限定名稱。

trans-unit.source: The second parameter is most useful when using inheritance.
trans-unit.target: 當使用繼承時，第二個參數是最有用。

trans-unit.source: The return type need not be the actual CLR instance of the resource.
trans-unit.target: 傳回型別不需要實際的 CLR 執行個體的資源。

trans-unit.source: It can be anything, for example, a cookie, that the implementation requires.
trans-unit.target: 它可以是任何項目，例如 cookie，需要實作。

trans-unit.source: The name of the entity set to which the resource belongs.
trans-unit.target: 資源所屬設實體的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The full namespace-qualified type name of the resource.
trans-unit.target: 資源的完整命名空間限定類型名稱。

trans-unit.source: The object representing a resource of specified type and belonging to the specified container.
trans-unit.target: 物件，代表指定類型的資源，並屬於指定的容器。

trans-unit.source: Deletes the specified resource.
trans-unit.target: 刪除指定的資源。

trans-unit.source: The `targetResource` is the opaque object returned by <xref:System.Data.Services.IUpdatable.GetResource%2A> or <xref:System.Data.Services.IUpdatable.CreateResource%2A>.
trans-unit.target: `targetResource`是不透明<xref:System.Data.Services.IUpdatable.GetResource%2A>或<xref:System.Data.Services.IUpdatable.CreateResource%2A>.</xref:System.Data.Services.IUpdatable.CreateResource%2A></xref:System.Data.Services.IUpdatable.GetResource%2A>所傳回的物件

trans-unit.source: The resource to be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 要刪除的資源。

trans-unit.source: Gets the resource of the specified type identified by a query and type name.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定之類型的查詢和型別名稱所識別的資源。

trans-unit.source: Language integrated query (LINQ) pointing to a particular resource.
trans-unit.target: Language integrated 的 query (LINQ) 指向特定的資源。

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified type name of resource.
trans-unit.target: 資源的完整限定的類型名稱。

trans-unit.source: An opaque object representing a resource of the specified type, referenced by the specified query.
trans-unit.target: 不透明的物件，表示指定的類型，指定查詢所參考的資源。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the specified property on the target object.
trans-unit.target: 取得目標物件上的指定屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: This method is called for scalar properties or complex properties.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法被呼叫純量屬性或複雜屬性。

trans-unit.source: For a scalar property, the returned object should be the actual value.
trans-unit.target: 純量屬性，傳回的物件應該是實際的值。

trans-unit.source: An opaque object that represents a resource.
trans-unit.target: 表示資源的不透明物件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property whose value needs to be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取需要其值之屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The value of the object.
trans-unit.target: 物件的值。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified value from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 從集合中移除指定的值。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified resource from the collection identified by a navigation property on the target object.
trans-unit.target: 從目標物件上的導覽屬性所識別的集合移除指定的資源。

trans-unit.source: This operation deletes the relationship between the two resource objects bound by the relationship.
trans-unit.target: 此操作會刪除關聯性所繫結的兩個資源物件之間的關聯性。

trans-unit.source: The target object that defines the property.
trans-unit.target: 目標物件所定義的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property whose value needs to be updated.
trans-unit.target: 更新需要其值之屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The property value that needs to be removed.
trans-unit.target: 必須移除的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Resets the resource identified by the parameter resource to its default value.
trans-unit.target: 參數所識別的資源會重設 resource 為其預設值。

trans-unit.source: The resource to be updated.
trans-unit.target: 要更新的資源。

trans-unit.source: The resource with its value reset to the default value.
trans-unit.target: 重設預設值，其值與資源。

trans-unit.source: Returns the instance of the resource represented by the specified resource object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回表示指定的資源物件的資源執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This method is called to resolve the opaque object returned by the <xref:System.Data.Services.IUpdatable.CreateResource%2A> or <xref:System.Data.Services.IUpdatable.GetResource%2A> API into the CLR instance.
trans-unit.target: 若要解決所傳回的不透明物件會呼叫這個方法<xref:System.Data.Services.IUpdatable.CreateResource%2A>或<xref:System.Data.Services.IUpdatable.GetResource%2A>CLR 執行個體的應用程式開發介面。</xref:System.Data.Services.IUpdatable.GetResource%2A> </xref:System.Data.Services.IUpdatable.CreateResource%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is normally called after <xref:System.Data.Services.IUpdatable.SaveChanges%2A> to serialize the resource for POST methods.
trans-unit.target: 這通常會呼叫之後<xref:System.Data.Services.IUpdatable.SaveChanges%2A>要序列化之資源的 POST 方法。</xref:System.Data.Services.IUpdatable.SaveChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is also called if there are update interceptors invoked with the common language runtime (CLR) resource instances.
trans-unit.target: 如果有更新的攔截器用來叫用 common language runtime (CLR) 的資源執行個體，也可以呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: It can be used if the provider supports optimistic concurrency and the resource type has concurrency tokens defined by <xref:System.Data.Services.ETagAttribute> in a CLR-based provider.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供者支援開放式並行存取，而且資源類型所定義的並行語彙基元可以用它<xref:System.Data.Services.ETagAttribute>以 CLR 為基礎的提供者中。</xref:System.Data.Services.ETagAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The object representing the resource whose instance needs to be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 物件，表示其執行個體必須要擷取的資源。

trans-unit.source: Returns the instance of the resource represented by the specified resource object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回表示指定的資源物件的資源執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Saves all the changes that have been made by using the <xref href="System.Data.Services.IUpdatable"></xref> APIs.
trans-unit.target: 儲存所有使用所做的變更<xref href="System.Data.Services.IUpdatable"></xref>應用程式開發介面。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Services.IUpdatable> implementation must track all changes until SaveChanges is called and then save all changes when SaveChanges is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Services.IUpdatable>實作必須追蹤所有變更，除非呼叫 SaveChanges 並再儲存所有變更時呼叫 SaveChanges。</xref:System.Data.Services.IUpdatable>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Services.IUpdatable> implementation is expected to save all of the changes or to reject all of the changes together.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Services.IUpdatable>實作預期儲存的所有變更，或拒絕的所有變更在一起。</xref:System.Data.Services.IUpdatable>

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the specified reference property on the target object.
trans-unit.target: 在目標物件上設定指定的參考屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The target object that defines the property.
trans-unit.target: 目標物件所定義的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property whose value needs to be updated.
trans-unit.target: 更新需要其值之屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The property value to be updated.
trans-unit.target: 要更新的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the property with the specified name on the target resource to the specified property value.
trans-unit.target: 設定指定的屬性值的目標資源具有指定名稱屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The target object that defines the property.
trans-unit.target: 目標物件所定義的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property whose value needs to be updated.
trans-unit.target: 更新需要其值之屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The property value for update.
trans-unit.target: 更新屬性值。
